works.description:
Hello,
 My name is Hammad Saeed and I am acting on behalf of Benny Lewis, My Employer Benny Lewis has written a detailed account of his language learning advice, only available to purchase through his site. I have contacted this torrent site to remove the pirated material, but they are not complying. Currently Google is sending them traffic for the simple search of the product name + "torrent" and my employer is losing a lot of business. Please remove it from your searches. Many thanks!"

My employer has stated that you can contact him if required. His name is Benny Lewis - e-mail "benny@irishpolyglot.com" – 
Here is website Address :  http://www.fluentin3months.com/language-hacking-guide
you can use the contact-me form by clicking the logo in the top right of the sales page and then clicking "contact me". Note the sales page and contact-me form prove ownership and contact availability.
 
Benny Lewis's Language Hacking Guide (http://www.fluentin3months.com/language-hacking-guide ) advertised as a paid product on this link.
